reviewText: Grandbabe loves dance and I went on and ordered most of the dvd's... LOOOOVE them !!!!!! She is so entertaining.

The Angelina Ballerina series of books come alive in the animated series. This particular DVD contains the episodes "William the Conjuror," "Angelina and Grandma," "Miss Lilly comes to Dinner" and "Angelina's Valentine." The episodes themselves run to about 12 mins each, interspersed with actual takes of dance lessons, either ballet, folk etc.

The animation is clear and remains faithful to Helen Craig's original illustrations and the stories are faithful to Katharina Holabird's original material. The series will appeal to aspiring young dancers and is recommended for preschoolers and up.

Perfect condition. My kids and I love this movie, out of the A.B. movies this is one of the tops. We haven't been able to find it anywhere so we were really glad to snatch it up at a reasonable price here. Arrived in brand new condition. We couldn't be happier.

R.I.P original Angelina, alas we loved you well.
I got this for my granddaughter for her birthday.  She loves this movie.  She loves being a ballarina.  Very cute.
both my daughters got bored watching it she glad we have Prime we didn't have to pay other wise i would have been very annoyed its cute but i ended up watching more then the kids
My little girl just loves the older UK versions of Angelina Ballerina. They are definately charming and Angelina usually learns a little life lesson along the way.
